ygData.subject: Re: High Pass Hold
ygData.msgSnippet: these maps just rock.. I dont know what it is about them.. maybe the color pencil approach.. what im curious though... is if someone could translate the
ygData.messageBody:
these maps just rock.. I dont know what it is about them.. maybe the color pencil approach.. what im curious though... is if someone could translate the japanese writing into an english version?
heh
yeah yeah i know im nagging but all you majors in Japanese or people that took courses in it or Native descendants from Japan.... this could give you something to do :)
and would be a great benefit to all of us....

<god i love these maps>

-----Original Message-----
From: Whitmore, Lance <lwhitmore@...>
To: 'EverQuest@onelist.com' <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, April 26, 1999 2:30 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: High Pass Hold


High pass is not that hard i go thru it all the time. There only two places orcs and gnolls spawn. To get to free port you might try pulling the orcs to the guard wait for him to kill them or us him as your second tank. Anyways heres a map of highpass... Parts are in japanese but you'll make it out..




-----Original Message-----
From: MFerrulo@... [mailto:MFerrulo@...]
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 1:01 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] High Pass Hold



From: MFerrulo@...



Ok, I''m a 9th Level Barbarian Warrior and last night I decided to make the
treacherous run from Queynos to Freeport. I got as far as High Pass Hold
when I was waylaid and killed by a gnoll soothsayer. I retrieved my corpse
and then spent an hour running around trying to find the way out of High Pass
Hold towards Freeport. IT WAS SO FRUSTRATING!!! It was also scary as hell
seeing how I was practically naked and the only player character in the
entire zone.

Could someone please give me some advice or direction in how to get the hell
out of High Pass Hold and through to Freeport?

McBanus of Halas
